moves.name: Heat Wave
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.effect: Removes the frozen condition from the user. The user also takes 25% of the damage it dealt to the target. Has a very small chance of leaving the target burned.

moves.name: My Destiny!
moves.effect: Drastically raises the user’s Sp. Atk and Speed. Lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def. If Charizard has Mega Evolved, also drastically raises the user’s Attack.

syncMove.name: Living Legend Blast Burn
syncMove.description: Become Mega Charizard X until the end of battle. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

passives.name: Propulsion 1
passives.description: Has a small chance of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when the user’s move is successful.

passives.name: Move Gauge Refresh 4
passives.description: Has a good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
